original: intros n b H. cut (1 + b * (alpha_nat b (S n) * alpha_nat b n) = alpha_nat b (S n) * alpha_nat b (S n) + alpha_nat b n * alpha_nat b n). - lia. - assert (Hle: 2 <= b) by lia. specialize (alpha_nat_le b Hle n) as Hal. specialize (alpha_nat_le b Hle (S n)) as Halsn. specialize (alpha_nat_ge_n b Hle n) as Han. specialize (alpha_nat_ge_n b Hle (S n)) as Hasn. specialize (Nat.crossmul_le_addsquare (alpha_nat b n) (alpha_nat b (S n)) Han Hasn) as Hc. specialize (Nat.quadmul_le_squareadd (alpha_nat b n) (alpha_nat b (S n)) Han Hasn) as Hq. lia.
